meanings.definition: A person or thing that polishes.
meanings.sent1: The polishers worked diligently to make the silver shine.
meanings.sent2: I bought a set of polishers to clean my jewelry.
meanings.sent3: The little robot polishers danced around the room, making everything sparkle.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a team of polishers, brightening up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The polishers in the workshop hummed with activity, bringing out the beauty in every surface.

meanings.definition: A tool or machine used for polishing.
meanings.sent1: The car wash had high-tech polishers that made the vehicles gleam.
meanings.sent2: The furniture factory invested in new polishers to improve their products.
meanings.sent3: The automatic polishers in the factory seemed to have a mind of their own, moving back and forth tirelessly.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashing against the shore acted like giant natural polishers, smoothing the rocks over time.
meanings.sent5: The old clock gleamed like new after a session with the expert polishers.
